title: Sonoma
name: Steiners Tavern
directions: On the west side of Sonoma Plaza
content: Founded in 1927, described by a local as "the only real bar in Sonoma". All the classics of a bar: live music, jukebox, pool, TV's, and heavy pours. Lots of locals and it can get pretty rowdy sometimes. It opens at 6AM if that tells you anything.
